summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing travel plans. Epstein mentions a delay in his arrival time and apologizes for typos in his message. The email is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers regarding the information contained within.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is communicating with Jes Staley regarding his travel plans and mentions a delay in his arrival.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is receiving an email from Epstein and is involved in the discussion about travel arrangements.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about personal travel plans, indicating a social relationship.

keyFacts: Epstein mentions he will arrive at 8 PM the following day.
The email contains a disclaimer about confidentiality and legal conditions.
